title: MILK TEA BOTTLE,Royal milk tea bottle,Ginger honey milk tea bottle
description:
Royal milk tea bottle

Infused earl grey leaf with milk, a minimum amount of sweetness


Ginger honey milk tea bottle

Infused earl grey leaf and ginger with milk, plus honey for a minimum amount of sweetness

title: CUBE CUBE,Banana choco cube,Matcha chestnut cube,Orange earl grey cube, Apple crumble cube, Veggie sale cube, Sausage sale cube
description:
Banana choco cube

A vanilla butter pound cake with dark chocolate chips, and rum banana almond paste in the middle.

Matcha chestnut cube

A matcha butter pound cake with sweetened chestnut in the middle.

Orange earl grey cube

An Earl Grey butter pound cake with a hint of orange scent.

Apple crumble cube

A vanilla butter pound cake with chunks of cinnamon apple compote and peanut butter crumble on top

Veggie sale cube

A hint of curry savoury veggie cake with jalapeno, dried tomato, caramelized onion, spinach, and cream cheese.

Sausage sale cube

A light savoury pound cake with beef sausage, dried tomato, mozzarella cheese, onion and basil.
price: 4 Cubes (choose 1 flavour): 18.00,4 Cubes (choose 2 flavours): 19.00,4 Cubes (choose 4 flavours): 20.00

description:

title: SCONE,Plain scone,Tangy orange scone,Double choco scone,Matcha white choco scone,Basil tomato scone,Jalapeno cheese scone
description:
Plain scone

A hint of vanilla and buttery scone, really simple and classic.


Tangy orange scone

Buttery scone with a bit of orange zest with a honey orange glazing.


Double choco scone

Rich chocolate scone with dark chocolate chips.

Matcha white choco scone

A matcha buttery scone with white chocolate chips.


Basil tomato scone

A savoury buttery scone with basil and dried tomato.


Jalapeno cheese scone

A savoury buttery scone with jalapeno and cheese.
